aboutInfo: Bom Português is a simple and didactic Question & Answer game to practice tricky portuguese words and expressions.
contentInfo: All the technical content available in this web application belongs to third parties and the source of each content is properly identified. The sources used for this project are the following:
howToPlayInfo: It's very simple: just read the 'Question of the day' with attention and select the option you consider correct. Next, check if you answered correctly and read a simple explanation about the correct option. You can also share the 'Question of the day' and/or your statistics with your friends. A new question is available every day.
privacyPolicyTerms1: Bom Português does not upload, store, use or share any of your data.
privacyPolicyTerms2: The application Bom Português neither collects any data nor implies any data collection by third parties or intermediaries. Any data collected when playing Bom Português (number of answered questions, correct answers and related game data) will be strictly stored in your browser. The data stored in the browser are containerized, i. e. stored with access restricted to this application, and cannot be accessed by other apps installed on the device.

privacyPolicyTerms4: You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
